animeDescription: With an American comic touch, the hip-hop song features a semi-biographical representation of the band bless4 who sings the song. They are 4 siblings who grew up in the US after being born in Okinawa and aimed to bridge the two countries through their music.
animeStaff: [['bless4', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Sasamoto Yasushi', ['Theme Song Lyrics', 'Theme Song Arrangement', 'Theme Song Composition']]]
